block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financing this week included today's regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and a two-year year note being auctioned on Wednesday.

According to traders, at the close of the New York cash market on Friday the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was at 5.69 percent and the rate on the six-month issue at 6.10 percent. In when-issued trading, the two-year note was offered at a price to yield 6.81 percent.
The Treasury's schedule of financing this week included today's regular weekly auction of new three- and six-month bills and a two-year year note being auctioned on Wednesday.

According to traders, at the close of the New York cash market on Friday the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was at 5.69 percent and the rate on the six-month issue at 6.10 percent. In when-issued trading, the two-year note was offered at a price to yield 6.81 percent.
The following taxable and tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
TAXABLE
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Commonwealth Bank of Australia, $750 million of senior subordinated debenture, A1/A+/---. Merrill Lynch and Salomon Smith Barney.
MGM Grand Inc., $500 million of senior subordinated notes due 2007, Ba2/BB+/---. BancAmerica Securities and Deutsche Bank Alex. Brown.
Source: MCM CorporateWatch Ratings: Moody's Investors Service/Standard & Poor's Corp./Duff & Phelps Credit.
TAX EXEMPT
WEDNESDAY
Texas Systems, $100 million of debt securities. Competitive.
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Illinois, $125 million of sales tax revenue bonds. Lehman Brothers.
Illinois Housing Development Authority, $53 million of debt securities. Salomon Smith Barney.
Iowa Finance Authority, $68 million of single family mortgage revenue bonds. PaineWebber.
Lake Orion Community School District, Michigan, $77.7 million of school building site bonds. A. G. Edwards & Sons.
New Jersey Higher Education Student Assistant Authority, $70 million of debt securities. PaineWebber.
North Carolina Housing Finance Authority, $100 million of debt securities. PaineWebber.
Puerto Rico Highway and Transportation Authority, $500 million of revenue bonds. Salomon Smith Barney.
University of Connecticut Special Obligation Student Fee, $88 million of revenue bonds. J. P. Morgan Securities.
